Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.search.Request

  • Packages that use Request 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.search
    The search package provides classes for performing places and geocoder searches.

    • Uses of Request in com.here.android.mpa.search

      Subclasses of Request in com.here.android.mpa.search 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AroundRequest
      The AroundRequest represents sets of places within a specific location context, usually the location of the user.
      class  DiscoveryRequest
      Represents an extended Request used to retrieve a DiscoveryResultPage object by way of Places search services.
      class  ExploreRequest
      Creates a ExploreRequest using a specified location context and category filter.
      class  GeocodeRequest
      The GeocodeRequest represents an extended Request used to retrieve Location data by way of Geocoder search services.
      class  HereRequest
      The HereRequest answers the questions "Where am I?" and "What's right here where I am standing?" The search results consist of a list of places with addresses that lie within the vicinity of the search location.
      class  MediaCollectionPageRequest<T>
      Represents an extended Request used to retrieve MediaCollectionPage information for a specific type of Media associated with a Place, by way of Places search services.
      class  PlaceRequest
      Represents an extended Request used to retrieve a Place object by way of Places search services.
      class  ReverseGeocodeRequest
      Deprecated. 
      As of SDK 3.1, replaced by ReverseGeocodeRequest2.
      class  ReverseGeocodeRequest2
      The ReverseGeocodeRequest2 represents an extended Request used to retrieve Location data by way of Geocoder search services.
      class  SearchRequest
      The SearchRequest processes text string queries based on the user's input to find specific places.
      class  TextAutoSuggestionRequest
      Represents an extended Request used to retrieve a List of suggested search terms, instants results and refined search links by way of Places search services.
      class  TextSuggestionRequest
      Represents an extended Request used to retrieve a List of search terms by way of Places search services.
      class  TransitSchedulePageRequest
      Represents an extended Request used to retrieve TransitSchedulePage information associated with a Place, by way of Places search services.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.search that return Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Request<T> Request.addReference(java.lang.String name)
      This function adds the name of a requested reference identifiers to be returned in the results.
      protected Request<T> Request.setCollectionSize(int value)
      Sets a collection size to be used for request responses.
      Request<T> Request.setForceOffline(boolean enableOffline)
      Deprecated. 
      As of SDK 2.1, this method has no affect. The connectivity mode of MapEngine (which can be controlled using MapEngine#setOnline(boolean)) will dictate the mode used when the Request is invoked.
      protected Request<T> Request.setMapViewport(GeoBoundingBox mapViewport)
      The map viewport is a bounding box of the map area currently visible to the user.
      Request<T> Request.setUserAuthentication(java.lang.String token)
      Some requests, such as when posting images or reviews, applications must provide an OAuth 2.0 bearer token (obtained from HERE Account) to authenticate the user performing the action.
